data.name: Townseek
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord!


About the Game


Embark on a journey to discover the legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston as you complete his journal! Take to the skies, and travel far and wide, discover exotic landmarks, visit faraway towns, trade with their hosts, complete quests, catch fish, discover artefacts, and make a name for yourself! The whole world is your sea now, so be sure to see all that it has to offer!

DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE WORLD

Explore an inviting pixelated, hand-drawn world at your own pace! Uncover unique locations, spawning lush forests, deep reefs, vast deserts, striking volcanos, and beyond!


TRADE WITH UNIQUE TOWNS

Trade with town hosts for items and profit! Complete their quests and improve your reputation for unique items and cosmetics. Discover diverse cultures of sharkfolk, cats, slimes, stonelings, regular humans, and more!


FISH, MINE, FARM AND CUSTOMISE YOUR SHIP

There are tons of things to do all over the world! Obtain a fishing rod and catch peculiar fish. Mine one-of-a-kind artefacts. Dig for treasure. Farm for exotic fruits. Obtain new blimps and hulls to customise your ship and make it uniquely yours!


COMPLETE YOUR JOURNAL

Complete town quests to start reassembling the journal bestowed to you by Captain Jawline, and discover the lost legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston! Fill it with memories of your own travels, strive to complete your item collection, and make it an unforgettable trip!

data.short_description: Townseek is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you fly around the world! Travel far and wide, discover exotic landmarks, trade with towns, fish, mine and farm, as you complete your journal and discover the lost legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
data.reviews:
“Townseek is a laid-back trad­ing game that just wants you to hang out in its cosy world.”
PC Gamer UK – Issue 360

“Townseek managed to live up to my expectations, providing me a zen experience while, at the same time, being fun enough to encourage me to seek the different collectables. If you're looking for something that allows you to relax after a day at work, Townseek is an excellent proposal.”
Pixel Glitch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), 8 or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
